      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Allows a user to login. Only use with user login option in main menu! If the username does not match up with password
        Parameters:
        username - the username input
        password - the password input
        Returns:
        True if user logged in, false if invalid login

      • createNewUser

        public boolean createNewUser(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password,
                             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<Trade>> tradeHistory)
                      throws InvalidUsernameException
        Attempts to add a new user to the HashMap of all users All usernames are unique. Returns the HashMap if the user successfully created, Throw error if there's another user with the same username.
        Parameters:
        username - the new username
        password - the string password
        tradeHistory - the hashmap of all user trades
        Returns:
        true if user account successfully created, false if user already exists in system
        Throws:
        InvalidUsernameException - if the username already exists in the system

      • getCanTrade

        public boolean getCanTrade(java.lang.String user,
                           int borrowedTimes,
                           int lendTimes,
                           int numIncomplete,
                           int numTradesMadeThisWeek)
                    throws UserFrozenException
        Returns whether or not this user can trade.
        Parameters:
        user - the user in question
        borrowedTimes - the num of times this user has borrowed
        lendTimes - the num of times this user has loaned
        numIncomplete - the num of incomplete trades this user has
        numTradesMadeThisWeek - the num of trade this user made this week
        Returns:
        True if this user can trade, false if not
        Throws:
        UserFrozenException - Throws if the user is already frozen

      • getCanTradeIgnoreBorrowsLoans

        public boolean getCanTradeIgnoreBorrowsLoans(java.lang.String username,
                                             int numIncomplete,
                                             int numTradesMadeThisWeek)
                                      throws UserFrozenException
        Variant of getCanTrade to check to see if the user can trade; will ignore borrows v. loans so that user can can loan items
        Parameters:
        username - user in question
        numIncomplete - the number of incomplete trades
        numTradesMadeThisWeek - the number of trade offers made this week
        Returns:
        true if the user can trade, false if not
        Throws:
        UserFrozenException - if the user is already frozen
